record.field: Report "%(report)s" must be cancelled before deletion.
The next invoices are related with Verifactu books: %(invoices)s. If you edit them take care if you need to update again to Verifactu
The next invoices are related with Verifactu books on draft state.
There are some reports in draft and/or confirmed. Any report won't be created until this reports will be processed.
The party of the invoice %(invoice)s must has a valid Tax Identifier.
The invoice %(invoice)s has wrong subjected and opertion verifactu combination.
The party [%(party)s] of the invoice %(invoice)s must has a valid Verifactu Identifier [VAT (only for intracommunity operators)].
Invoice "%(invoice)s" must be posted, paid or refunded.
Invoice "%(invoice)s" is duplicated on Verifactu Report "%(report)s".

The parties of the invoices "%(invoices)s" has the Verifactu Identfier as 'Simplified Invoice'. The Verifactu operation key will be switched to 'Simplified Invoice (ticket)' or 'Invoice summary entry' as appropriate, and the invoices will be send to AEAT without destination identification.

The parties of the invoices "%(invoices)s" has not set the Verifactu Identfier as 'Simplified Invoice', but the invoice Verifactu operation key is set as 'Simplified Invoice (ticket)' or 'Invoice summary entry'. The invoices will be send to AEAT without destination identification.
There isn't a certificate deffined in the account configuration for the Verifactu.
The invoice "%(invoice)s" haven't got the necessary Verifactu keys filled.
